description: This flavour-packed slow-cooked beef brisket and jalapeño pizza recipe will become your new go-to weekend dinner.
name: Brisket & Jalapeño Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g Woolworths BBQ Slow Cooked Beef Brisket Burnt Ends with Mustard BBQ Sauce
1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rings
1 cup Woolworths Mozzarella Cheddar & Parmesan Shredded Blend

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/ 220°C fan-forced. Place 2 large baking trays in the oven.
Pierce the packet of beef twice with a knife. Microwave on HIGH for 5 minutes or until meat is warmed through. Transfer to a bowl. Use 2 forks to shred beef into large chunks. Set aside.
Spread 2 tbs of barbecue sauce over one pizza base. Scatter base with half the beef, half the red onion, 1/2 cup of cheese and half the jalapeno. Repeat with the second pizza base.
Place both pizzas carefully on the hot baking trays. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until the cheese has melted and bases are golden and crisp. Sprinkle with coriander leaves. Serve.
